name: Stellar Production
description:
Play as Yamato Hashi, an employee at Stellar Productions working in management. Join him as he becomes the new producer of three new idols to their company in a long time and help shape them into the best idols they can be,

Meet Akari Nakamura, Kazuko Mori and Maiko Hisakawa. The new idols you'll be training. Can you bring them to their debut? Will they be able to work together to become a unit unrivalled? Only you can decide.
